name: Tetsuo Shibuya
content: Tetsuo Shibuya's home page Tetsuo Shibuya's Page Japanese version About I am a professor of Division of Medical Data Informtaics, Human Genome Center, the Institute of Medical Science, the University of Tokyo. I am also belong to the Department of Computer Science, Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, at the same university. The home page of Shibuya laboratory is located here. Research topics in my research: Algorithms in Computational Biology / Bioinformatics Indexing/Searching algorithms for bio-big data Artificial Intelligence for bio-big data Sequence/structure/function analysis Applications to clinical sequencing Applications to molecular biology etc. Algorithms and Theory Combinatorial pattern matchingDatabase search Graph and network analysis Artifical Intelligence / Learning theory Privacy preserving computation etc. At the Institute of Medical Science, the University of Tokyo Curriculum Vitae Personal history Publication list Links Shibuya Laboratory Related universities and research institutes Human Genome Center, Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo Department of Computer Science, Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, University of Tokyo Contact Address Division of Medical Data Informatics, Human Genome Center, The Institute of Medical Science, The University of Tokyo, 4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minato-ku, Tokyo 108-8639, JAPAN. Location (Room#401, the building of the Human Genome Center (campus map)) Phone: +81-3-5449-5791 / +81-3-5449-5615 (secretary)E-mail: tshibuya (domain: @hgc.jp) / shibuyalab-jimu (domain: @hgc.jp) (secretary) Copyright (c) 2004- Tetsuo Shibuya. All rights reserved. Last updated: 2 May, 2008
